abstract.para: Following sections describe known issues you may encounter while using DataCleaner Monitor. You can also find workarounds and tips on how to fix the problems when such a solution exists.

section.title: Are some (equally named) metrics missing?
section.para: Have you selected multiple metrics for a timeline and not all of them are showed in the graph? There may be a problem with equal names of metrics coming from different metric groups.

section.title: Workaround
section.para: You can fix this problem in your job by providing unique names for all of your analyzers / components.
